name: Stationary Setinel
description:
A small, space themed hypercasual game. It takes place on a spaceship carrier, where you shoot a railgun at spacecraft that are attacking you. Made for the 2023 GameFlip Game Jam!

Controls:
A and D/Left arrow and Right arrow to rotate

Space or LMB to fire

Please note that this game isn't signed. It is safe, but I do not know if it'll cause a message to appear. Also, feel free to leave suggestions in the comments!
